basics.name: Michael Chen
basics.label: Senior Project Manager
basics.summary: Results-driven project manager with 10+ years of experience leading cross-functional teams to deliver complex software projects on time and within budget. Certified PMP and Scrum Master with expertise in Agile methodologies, stakeholder management, and risk mitigation. Proven ability to bridge technical and business requirements.

work.summary: Lead multiple concurrent enterprise-scale projects with budgets ranging from $2M-$10M
highlights: Managed delivery of cloud migration project for Fortune 500 client, coordinating team of 40+ developers across 4 time zones
Reduced project delivery time by 30% through implementation of Agile practices and automation tools
Achieved 95% on-time delivery rate across 15+ projects over 4 years
Successfully negotiated with stakeholders to align project scope with business objectives, preventing $3M in scope creep
Led post-implementation review process that identified process improvements, reducing defect rate by 25%

work.summary: Managed product development lifecycle for web and mobile applications
highlights: Led development of mobile banking application serving 500K+ users, delivered 2 weeks ahead of schedule
Coordinated with product owners, designers, and engineering teams to define requirements and user stories
Implemented risk management framework that reduced critical issues by 40%
Mentored 2 junior project managers, both promoted to mid-level positions
Facilitated daily standups, sprint planning, retrospectives for teams of 8-12 members

work.summary: Supported senior project managers in delivering web applications for SMB clients
highlights: Assisted in management of 5+ concurrent projects with teams of 4-8 developers
Created and maintained project documentation, timelines, and status reports
Coordinated with QA team to ensure quality standards were met before releases
